translations.Error getting OAuth accessible resource: Hitilafu katika kupata orodha ya nyenzo zinazoweza kufikiwa za OAuth.
Hitilafu katika kupata tokeni ya ufikiaji ya OAuth.
_You have %s open issue with recent acti: You have %s open issue with recent activity in Jira.
Una masuala %s ambayo hayajafunguliwa na shughuli za hivi karibuni huko Jira.
translations.Integration of Jira user support/ticketi: Ujumuishaji wa usaidizi wa mtumiaji wa Jira/suluhisho la tikiti
translations.Jira integration provides a dashboard wi:
Ujumuishaji wa Jira hutoa wijeti ya dashibodi inayoonyesha arifa zako muhimu,
mtoa huduma aliyeunganishwa kutafuta masuala
na arifa kuhusu shughuli za hivi majuzi zinazohusiana na masuala uliyokabidhiwa.
translations.Jira admin options saved: Chaguo za msimamizi wa Jira zimehifadhiwa
translations.Failed to save Jira admin options: Imeshindwa kuhifadhi chaguo za msimamizi wa Jira
translations.If you want to allow your Nextcloud user: Iwapo ungependa kuruhusu watumiaji wako wa Nextcloud kutumia OAuth kuthibitisha kwa Jira, fungua programu katika mipangilio yako ya msimamizi wa Jira na uweke kitambulisho na siri hapa.
translations.Make sure you set the redirection/callba: Hakikisha umeweka URL ya kuelekeza kwingine/kupigiwa simu kuwa
translations.Don't forget to make your Jira OAuth app: Usisahau kufanya ombi lako la Jira OAuth hadharani.
translations.How to make Jira OAuth public: Jinsi ya kufanya Jira OAuth hadharani
translations.Put the \"Client ID\" and \"Client secre: Weka "Kitambulisho cha Mteja" na "Siri ya Mteja" hapa chini. Watumiaji wako wa Nextcloud kisha wataona kitufe cha "Unganisha kwa Jira" katika mipangilio yao ya kibinafsi.
translations.OAuth access token could not be obtained: Tokeni ya ufikiaji ya OAuth haikuweza kupatikana:
translations.Impossible to connect to Jira instance: Haiwezekani kuunganisha kwa mfano wa Jira
translations.Login/password are invalid or account is: Uingiaji/nenosiri ni batili au akaunti imefungwa
translations.Failed to connect to Jira Software: Imeshindwa kuunganishwa na Software ya Jira
translations.Failed to save Jira OAuth state: Imeshindwa kuhifadhi hali ya Jira OAuth
translations.Enable unified search for tickets: Wezesha utafutaji wa umoja kwa tiketi
translations.Enable user link preview: Wezesha hakikisho la kiungo cha mtumiaji
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Onyo, kila kitu unachoandika kwenye upau wa kutafutia kitatumwa kwenye Jira.
translations.Enable notifications for open tickets: Washa arifa kwa tiketi zilizo wazi
translations.Select Jira projects for Dashboard widge: Chagua miradi ya Jira ya wijeti ya Dashibodi
translations.Only projects available to your Jira acc: Miradi inayopatikana kwa akaunti yako ya Jira pekee ndiyo iliyoorodheshwa.
translations.Ask your Nextcloud administrator to conf: Uliza msimamizi wako wa Nextcloud kusanidi programu ya Jira Cloud OAuth ili uweze kujiunganisha kwenye huduma hii.
translations.Jira self-hosted instance address: Anwani ya mfano wa Jira mwenyeji
translations.Connect to this Jira instance: Unganisha kwenye mfano huu wa Jira
translations.Error connecting to Jira: Hitilafu wakati wa kuunganisha kwenye Jira
